import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

xs = np.linspace(0,10)

plt.title("y = 2x")
plt.xlabel("x")
plt.ylabel("y")
plt.plot(xs,2 * xs)

import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame(np.array([xs, 2*xs]).transpose()) 
df.columns = ['x','y']
df
